amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Graduate Medical Education slots by $5 million and reduces funding from the Office of the Secretary of Educations departmental fund by the same amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 61 printed in Part A of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for Graduate Medical Education slots and cuts funding from the Office of the Secretary of Educations departmental fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 365 - 54 (Roll no. 307).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 365 - 54 (Roll no. 307).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A058) offered by Mrs. Lee (NV).
